translated: Some think that the ear is in contact with its object-field when it grasps the sound, and not in contact with its object-field when it does not grasp it.üîΩThe other sense-faculties, nose, tongue and body, are in contact with their object-field.

original: gsum gzhan du /
analyzed: gsum gzhan du /
translated: The rest, i.e., the nose, the tongue and the body, are in contact with their object-field.

original: yul dang phrad pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: yul dang phrad pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The sense-faculty is in contact with the object-field when the object-field is present.

original: sna ji ltar yul dang phrad pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: sna ji ltar yul dang phrad pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is the nose in contact with its object-field?

original: dbugs ma brngubs par dri mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbugs ma brngubs par dri mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because one does not grasp an odor without breathing in.üîΩWhat is meant by in contact?

original: phrad pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na /üîΩ'dab chags par 'byung ba'o//
analyzed: phrad pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na /üîΩ'dab chags par 'byung ba'o//
translated: In a state of conjunction.

original: ci rdul phra rab rnams phan tshun reg gam 'on te mi reg ce na /
analyzed: ci rdul phra rab rnams phan tshun reg gam 'on te mi reg ce na /
translated: Do the subtle atoms touch each other or not?

original: kha che ba rnams na re mi reg go zhes zer ro //
analyzed: kha che ba rnams na re mi reg go zhes zer ro //
translated: The KƒÅ≈õmƒ´rians say that they do not touch each other.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: re zhig gal te bdag nyid thams cad kyis reg par 'gyur na ni rdzas rnams 'dres par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: re zhig gal te bdag nyid thams cad kyis reg par 'gyur na ni rdzas rnams 'dres par 'gyur ro //
translated: If they touch each other in their entirety, then the substances would merge.üîΩIf they touch each other in part, then the atoms would have parts.

original: 'on te phyogs gcig gis reg na ni cha shas dang bcas ba dag tu thal bar 'gyur ba zhig na rdul phra rab rnams ni cha shas med pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on te phyogs gcig gis reg na ni cha shas dang bcas ba dag tu thal bar 'gyur ba zhig na rdul phra rab rnams ni cha shas med pa yin no //
translated: But the atoms are without parts.

original: 'o na ji ltar sgra mngon bar 'grub par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar sgra mngon bar 'grub par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How then is sound produced?

original: de nyid kyi phyir te /üîΩgal te reg par gyur na lag ba sa lag pa la bsnun na 'bying bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir te / gal te reg par gyur na lag ba sa lag pa la bsnun na 'bying bar 'gyur la /
translated: Because of the very fact that they do not touch each other.üîΩIf they touched each other, then when one struck one‚Äôs hand against another hand, or a stone against another stone,

original: rdo bas rdo ba la bsnun na yang 'bying bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo bas rdo ba la bsnun na yang 'bying bar 'gyur ro //
translated: there would be penetration.

original: ji ltar bsags pa la brgyab na zhigs par mi 'gyur zhe na ;
analyzed: ji ltar bsags pa la brgyab na zhigs par mi 'gyur zhe na ;
translated: How is it that a pile does not collapse?

original: rlung gi khams kyis bzung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rlung gi khams kyis bzung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is held together by the wind constituent.

original: rlung gi khams kha cig ni 'jig bar zhugs pa yin te dper na 'jig pa'i tshe lta bu'o //
analyzed: rlung gi khams kha cig ni 'jig bar zhugs pa yin te dper na 'jig pa'i tshe lta bu'o //
translated: Some of the wind element is engaged in destruction, for example, at the time of destruction.

original: kha cig ni 'dzin par zhugs pa yin te dper na chags pa'i tshe lta bu'o //
analyzed: kha cig ni 'dzin par zhugs pa yin te dper na chags pa'i tshe lta bu'o //
translated: Some is engaged in holding, for example, at the time of creation.

original: da ni ji ltar 'dab chags par phrad bas gsum po yul dang phrad pa zhes bya zhe na ;
analyzed: da ni ji ltar 'dab chags par phrad bas gsum po yul dang phrad pa zhes bya zhe na ;
translated: Now, how can it be said that the three sense faculties and objects contact each other when they are not mutually pervasive?

original: de dag gi dbus na cung zad kyang med pa gang yin pa da kho na 'dab chags ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: de dag gi dbus na cung zad kyang med pa gang yin pa da kho na 'dab chags ba nyid yin no //
translated: The very fact that there is nothing in between them is their mutual pervasion.

original: yang 'dus pa rnams ni cha shas dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir reg par 'gyur bas nyes pa med do //
analyzed: yang 'dus pa rnams ni cha shas dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir reg par 'gyur bas nyes pa med do //
translated: Moreover, there is no fault because when they are assembled, they are said to contact each other because they possess parts.

original: de ltar byas na bye brag tu bshad pa las /
analyzed: de ltar byas na bye brag tu bshad pa las /
translated: If that is so, then the Abhidharmako≈õa would not say:

original: ci reg pa'i rgyu can gyi reg pa zhig skyes pa 'am /
analyzed: ci reg pa'i rgyu can gyi reg pa zhig skyes pa 'am /
translated: Does contact arise due to contact or does it arise due to noncontact?

original: 'on te ma reg pa'i rgyu can zhig skye zhes dris nas smras pa /
analyzed: 'on te ma reg pa'i rgyu can zhig skye zhes dris nas smras pa /
translated: It is said:

original: rgyu'i phyir res 'ga' ni rig pa'i rgyu chan gyi ma reg pa skye ste /
analyzed: rgyu'i phyir res 'ga' ni rig pa'i rgyu chan gyi ma reg pa skye ste /
translated: Sometimes noncontact arises due to contact as a cause.

original: gang gi cho rnam par zhigs pa na'o //
analyzed: gang gi cho rnam par zhigs pa na'o //
translated: When it disintegrates.

original: res 'ga' ni ma reg pa'i rgyu can gyi reg pa skye ste /
analyzed: res 'ga' ni ma reg pa'i rgyu can gyi reg pa skye ste /
translated: Sometimes contact arises without cause,

original: gang gi cho bsags par 'gyur ba na'o //
analyzed: gang gi cho bsags par 'gyur ba na'o //
translated: when the particles come together.

original: res 'ga' ni reg pa'i rgyu can gyi reg pa skye ste /
analyzed: res 'ga' ni reg pa'i rgyu can gyi reg pa skye ste /
translated: Sometimes contact arises with cause,

original: gang gi tshe bsags pa dang ldan pa bsags pa kho na'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe bsags pa dang ldan pa bsags pa kho na'o //
translated: when the particles are already in contact and come together.üîΩSometimes non-contact arises without cause,

original: res 'ga' ni ma reg pa'i rgyu can gyi ma reg pa skye ste dper na nyi zer gyi rdul lta bu'o zhes 'byang ba'i gzung 'di yang 'thad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: res 'ga' ni ma reg pa'i rgyu can gyi ma reg pa skye ste dper na nyi zer gyi rdul lta bu'o zhes 'byang ba'i gzung 'di yang 'thad par 'gyur ro //
translated: like the particles of sunlight.

original: btsun pa dbyig bshes na re ni rdul phra rab rnams reg par gyur na ni skad cig ma phyi mar gnas bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ro //
analyzed: btsun pa dbyig bshes na re ni rdul phra rab rnams reg par gyur na ni skad cig ma phyi mar gnas bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ro //
translated: The Bhadanta Vasumitra says: When the subtle particles come into contact, they remain in the second moment.

original: btsun pa na re ni @50a * //
analyzed: btsun pa na re ni @50a * //
translated: The Bhadanta says:

original: reg pa ni med kyi 'dab chags pa la reg go snyam du 'du shes par zad do zhes zer te /
analyzed: reg pa ni med kyi 'dab chags pa la reg go snyam du 'du shes par zad do zhes zer te /
translated: There is no contact, but there is the idea of contact with respect to what is contiguous.

original: btsun pa'i lugs 'dod par bya'o //
analyzed: btsun pa'i lugs 'dod par bya'o //
translated: The Bhadanta‚Äôs position should be accepted.

original: de lta ma yin na ni rdul phra rab bar dang bcas pa rnams kyis bar stong pa dag tu 'gro ba la su zhig 'gog na 'di ltar thogs pa dang bcas pa dag tu 'dod /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na ni rdul phra rab bar dang bcas pa rnams kyis bar stong pa dag tu 'gro ba la su zhig 'gog na 'di ltar thogs pa dang bcas pa dag tu 'dod /
translated: But they are considered to be impeded.

original: rdul phra rab rnams las bsags pa dag gzhan yang ma yin pas de dag kho na bsags pa la reg pa yin te dper na gzugs su rung ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: rdul phra rab rnams las bsags pa dag gzhan yang ma yin pas de dag kho na bsags pa la reg pa yin te dper na gzugs su rung ba lta bu'o //
translated: And since the aggregates are not different from the particles, the particles touch each other, just as form does.

original: gal te rdul phra rab la phyogs cha tha dad par rtog na ni reg gam ma reg kyang rung ste /
analyzed: gal te rdul phra rab la phyogs cha tha dad par rtog na ni reg gam ma reg kyang rung ste /
translated: If you imagine that the particles have different directional parts, then whether they touch or not,

original: cha shas dang bcas pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: cha shas dang bcas pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the consequence is that they have parts.

original: gal te ma yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te ma yin na ni /
translated: If you say that they do not,

original: reg kyang thal bar mi 'gyur ro //üîΩyang ci'i mig la sogs pa 'di dag gis bdag nyid kyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i don la mgal me'i 'khor lo la sogs pa bzhin du myur du 'jug pas ri la sogs pa 'dzin tam /
analyzed: reg kyang thal bar mi 'gyur ro // yang ci'i mig la sogs pa 'di dag gis bdag nyid kyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i don la mgal me'i 'khor lo la sogs pa bzhin du myur du 'jug pas ri la sogs pa 'dzin tam /
translated: then even if they touch, the consequence is not that they have parts.

original: 'on te mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa zhig la 'dzin ce na /
analyzed: 'on te mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa zhig la 'dzin ce na /
translated: Do the eye, etc., grasp objects that are equal in size to themselves, like a wheel, etc., by quickly moving over them, or do they grasp objects that are unequal in size?

original: re zhig gang dag yul dang phrad par bshad pa /
analyzed: re zhig gang dag yul dang phrad par bshad pa /
translated: Some say: Those that contact their object field are explained first.üîΩ

original: sna la sogs pa gsum po de dag rnams kyis ni /
analyzed: sna la sogs pa gsum po de dag rnams kyis ni /
translated: The three sense faculties of smell, etc.,

original: yul ni mnyam par 'dzin par 'dod //
analyzed: yul ni mnyam par 'dzin par 'dod //
translated: are considered to grasp their object-fieldüîΩin a manner similar to the sense faculty of touch.

original: dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams ji snyed pa de snyed kyi yul gyi rdul phra rab rnams dang phrad nas rnam par shes pa skyed de //
analyzed: dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams ji snyed pa de snyed kyi yul gyi rdul phra rab rnams dang phrad nas rnam par shes pa skyed de //
translated: The sense faculty of touch is in contact with as many atoms of the object-field as there are atoms of the sense faculty.

original: mig dang rna ba dag gis ni ma nges te /
analyzed: mig dang rna ba dag gis ni ma nges te /
translated: The eye and the ear do not always grasp an object-field of their dimension.

original: res 'ga' ni chung ste gang gi tshe skra'i rtse mo mthong ba na'o //
analyzed: res 'ga' ni chung ste gang gi tshe skra'i rtse mo mthong ba na'o //
translated: Sometimes the object-field is smaller than the sense faculty: when one sees the point of a needle.

original: res 'ga' ni mnyam ste gang gi tshe rgun 'brum mthong ba na'o //
analyzed: res 'ga' ni mnyam ste gang gi tshe rgun 'brum mthong ba na'o //
translated: Sometimes it is equal to the sense faculty: when one sees a grape.

original: res 'ga' ni che ste gang gi tshe mig phye ba tsam gyis ri chen po mthong ba na'o //
analyzed: res 'ga' ni che ste gang gi tshe mig phye ba tsam gyis ri chen po mthong ba na'o //
translated: Sometimes it is larger than the sense faculty: when one sees a mountain with the naked eye.

original: de bzhin du rna bas sbrang bu dang 'brug la sogs pa'i sgra thos pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rna bas sbrang bu dang 'brug la sogs pa'i sgra thos pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The same for the ear and sound: the sound of mosquitoes, of thunder, etc.

original: yid ni lus can ma yin pa kho na bas 'di'i tshad yongs su chad pa ni mi spyod do //
analyzed: yid ni lus can ma yin pa kho na bas 'di'i tshad yongs su chad pa ni mi spyod do //
translated: The mental faculty, being non-material, does not have a dimension.

original: yang mig gi dbang po la sogs pa 'di dag gi rdul phra rab rnams ji ltar gnas she na /
analyzed: yang mig gi dbang po la sogs pa 'di dag gi rdul phra rab rnams ji ltar gnas she na /
translated: How are the atoms of the eye sensefaculty, etc. arranged?

original: re zhig mig gi rdul phra rab rnams ni mig gi 'bras bu la /üîΩgo snyod kyi me tog bzhin du gnas te /
analyzed: re zhig mig gi rdul phra rab rnams ni mig gi 'bras bu la / go snyod kyi me tog bzhin du gnas te /
translated: The atoms of the eye sensefaculty are arranged on the pupil of the eye, like a lentil seed.

original: kha dog dang bcas bkab pas gyes par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: kha dog dang bcas bkab pas gyes par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They are covered by a membrane, which prevents them from dispersing.

original: gzhan dag na re gong bu bzhin du bla 'og na gnas te /
analyzed: gzhan dag na re gong bu bzhin du bla 'og na gnas te /
translated: According to another opinion, they are arranged in a ball, like the flower of the cardamom plant.

original: shel bzhin du dang ba'i phyir phan tshun mi sgrib po zhes zer ro //
analyzed: shel bzhin du dang ba'i phyir phan tshun mi sgrib po zhes zer ro //
translated: They do not obscure each other, because they are transparent, like a crystal.

original: rna ba'i dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams ni rna ba'i bu ga'i nang na gnas so //
analyzed: rna ba'i dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams ni rna ba'i bu ga'i nang na gnas so //
translated: The atoms of the ear sensefaculty are arranged in the interior of the bulla of the ear.

original: sna'i dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams ni mtshul pa'i nang na gnas te /
analyzed: sna'i dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams ni mtshul pa'i nang na gnas te /
translated: The atoms of the nose sensefaculty are arranged in the interior of the nostrils, like two needles.

original: dbang po dang po gsum ni phreng ba bzhin du gnas so /
analyzed: dbang po dang po gsum ni phreng ba bzhin du gnas so /
translated: The first three sensefaculties are arranged like a lentil seed.

original: lce'i dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams ni zla ba kham pa lta bu yin te /
analyzed: lce'i dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams ni zla ba kham pa lta bu yin te /
translated: The atoms of the tongue sensefaculty are arranged in the form of a halfmoon.

original: lce'i dbus na @50b skra'i rtse mo'i byon tsam zhig lce'i dbang po'i rdul phra rab dag gis ma khebs so zhes grag go //
analyzed: lce'i dbus na @50b skra'i rtse mo'i byon tsam zhig lce'i dbang po'i rdul phra rab dag gis ma khebs so zhes grag go //
translated: In the middle of the tongue, there is a space the size of the tip of a hair that is not occupied by the atoms of the tongue sense-faculty.

original: lus kyi dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams ni lus bzhin du gnas so //üîΩmo'i dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams ni rnga'i sbubs lta bu yin no //
analyzed: lus kyi dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams ni lus bzhin du gnas so // mo'i dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams ni rnga'i sbubs lta bu yin no //
translated: The atoms of the body sense-faculty are arranged like the body.üîΩThe atoms of the female sexual faculty are arranged like a drum.

original: pho'i dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams ni mthe bong lta bu yin no //
analyzed: pho'i dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams ni mthe bong lta bu yin no //
translated: The atoms of the male sexual faculty are arranged like a thumb.

original: de la mig gi dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams res 'ga' ni thams cad bsten pa dang bcas pa dag yin no //
analyzed: de la mig gi dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams res 'ga' ni thams cad bsten pa dang bcas pa dag yin no //
translated: The atoms of the eye sense-faculty are sometimes all homogeneous;

original: res 'ga' ni de dang mtshungs pa dag yin no //üîΩres 'ga' ni kha cig bsten pa dang bcas pa dag yin la /
analyzed: res 'ga' ni de dang mtshungs pa dag yin no // res 'ga' ni kha cig bsten pa dang bcas pa dag yin la /
translated: sometimes they are half homogeneous;

original: kha cig de dang mtshungs pa yin te /
analyzed: kha cig de dang mtshungs pa yin te /
translated: sometimes one half is homogeneous and the other half is not.

original: lce'i dbang po'i rdul phra rab kyi bar du yang de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: lce'i dbang po'i rdul phra rab kyi bar du yang de dang 'dra'o //
translated: The same for the atoms of the tongue sense-faculty.

original: lus kyi dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams ni ril gyis bsten pa dang bcas pa ni med de /
analyzed: lus kyi dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams ni ril gyis bsten pa dang bcas pa ni med de /
translated: There is no atom of the body sense faculty that is not supported.

original: rab tu 'bar ba'i dmyal ba'i nang na 'khod pa rnams la yang lus kyi dbang pa'i rdul phra rab tshad med ba zhig de dang mtshungs pa yin te /
analyzed: rab tu 'bar ba'i dmyal ba'i nang na 'khod pa rnams la yang lus kyi dbang pa'i rdul phra rab tshad med ba zhig de dang mtshungs pa yin te /
translated: Even those who are in the middle of the blazing fire of the hells have an immeasurable number of atoms of the body sense faculty that are similar to it.

original: thams cad kyis rnam par shes pa bskyed na ni lus zhig par 'gyur ro lo //
analyzed: thams cad kyis rnam par shes pa bskyed na ni lus zhig par 'gyur ro lo //
translated: If all of them generated consciousness, the body would disintegrate.

original: dbang po'i rdul phra rab bam yul gyi rdul phra rab gcig gis rnam par shes bskyed pa ni med de /
analyzed: dbang po'i rdul phra rab bam yul gyi rdul phra rab gcig gis rnam par shes bskyed pa ni med de /
translated: A single atom of the sense faculty or a single atom of the object does not generate consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po dag gi rten dang dmigs pa ni bsags pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po dag gi rten dang dmigs pa ni bsags pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the basis and object field of the five collections of consciousness are accumulated.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rdul phra rab ni mi mthong ba'i phyir bstan du med pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rdul phra rab ni mi mthong ba'i phyir bstan du med pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, because atoms are not seen, they are imperceptible.

original: ci mig gi rnam par shes pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi khams drug po bshad pa gang dag yin pa'i dag ji ltar lnga rnams kyi yul da ltar yin la /
analyzed: ci mig gi rnam par shes pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi khams drug po bshad pa gang dag yin pa'i dag ji ltar lnga rnams kyi yul da ltar yin la /
translated: Are the six elements from eye consciousness to mind consciousness, which were explained above, like the five sense faculties, which have present objects?üîΩOr are they like the last, which have three times as objects?

original: tha ma'i dus gsum yin pa ltar rten kyang de lta bu yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: tha ma'i dus gsum yin pa ltar rten kyang de lta bu yin nam zhe na /
translated: Are their supports also like that?

original: smras pa ma yin no //
analyzed: smras pa ma yin no //
translated: They reply: No.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: Then what?

original: tha ma'i rten 'das /
analyzed: tha ma'i rten 'das /
translated: The last has a past support.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rten ni 'gags ma thag pa'i yid do //üîΩlnga rnams kyi /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rten ni 'gags ma thag pa'i yid do // lnga rnams kyi /
translated: The support of the element of mental consciousness is the mind that has just ceased.üîΩThe five have two kinds of support.

original: de dag lhan cig skyes pa'ang yin /
analyzed: de dag lhan cig skyes pa'ang yin /
translated: The five have a support that is simultaneous with them.

original: 'ang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'das pa yang yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'ang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'das pa yang yin pa'o //
translated: The word also indicates that they also have a past support.

original: de la mig gi rnam par shes pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i rten ni mig yin pa nas lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang lus yin la /
analyzed: de la mig gi rnam par shes pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i rten ni mig yin pa nas lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang lus yin la /
translated: The simultaneous support of eye consciousness is the eye, and so on up to: the simultaneous support of body consciousness is the body.

original: de dag 'das pa'i rten ni yid yin no //
analyzed: de dag 'das pa'i rten ni yid yin no //
translated: Their past support is the mind.

original: de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po de dag gi rten ni dbang po gnyis gnyis yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po de dag gi rten ni dbang po gnyis gnyis yin no //
translated: Thus the five groups of consciousness have two sense-faculties as their basis.

original: de gnyis kyi phyir gang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rten gyi dngos por yin pa de de'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyis dngos por yang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de gnyis kyi phyir gang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rten gyi dngos por yin pa de de'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyis dngos por yang yin zhe na /
translated: For these two, is that which is the basis of the visual consciousness also the equivalent and immediate antecedent condition of the visual consciousness?

original: mu bzhi ste /
analyzed: mu bzhi ste /
translated: There are four alternatives.

original: mu dang po ni mig yin no //üîΩgnyis pa ni chos kyi khams sems @51a * //üîΩlas byung ba 'das ma thag pa yin no //
analyzed: mu dang po ni mig yin no // gnyis pa ni chos kyi khams sems @51a * // las byung ba 'das ma thag pa yin no //
translated: The first alternative is the eye.üîΩThe second is the immediately preceding mental faculty.

original: gsum pa ni 'das ma thag pa'i yid yin no //
analyzed: gsum pa ni 'das ma thag pa'i yid yin no //
translated: The third is the immediately preceding element of factors.

original: bzhi pa ni bshad pa las ma gtogs pa'i chos rnams yin te /
analyzed: bzhi pa ni bshad pa las ma gtogs pa'i chos rnams yin te /
translated: The fourth is the factors not mentioned in the above explanations.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang de bzhin du rang gi dbang po brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang de bzhin du rang gi dbang po brjod par bya'o //
translated: The same method applies to the sense-faculties of the body up to the sense-faculty of the body.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ni tshig snga ma dang sbyor ba ste ;
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ni tshig snga ma dang sbyor ba ste ;
translated: The immediately preceding condition of the mental consciousness is to be connected with the above phrases.

original: re zhig gang rten gyi dngos por yin pa de ni mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyi dngos por yang yin no //üîΩmtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyi dngos por yin la rten gyi dngos por ma yin pa yang yod de /
analyzed: re zhig gang rten gyi dngos por yin pa de ni mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyi dngos por yang yin no // mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyi dngos por yin la rten gyi dngos por ma yin pa yang yod de /
translated: The factor that is a basis is also a factor that is an equivalent and immediate antecedent.üîΩThere is a factor that is an equivalent and immediate antecedent that is not a basis.

original: chos kyi khams sems las byung ba 'das ma thag pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi khams sems las byung ba 'das ma thag pa'o //
translated: It is the factor of the element of factors that is the immediately preceding thought and thought concomitants.

original: yang mig gi rnam par shes pa ni gnyi ga la rag lus te skye na /
analyzed: yang mig gi rnam par shes pa ni gnyi ga la rag lus te skye na /
translated: If visual consciousness arises in dependence on both,

original: ci'i phyir mig la sogs pa kho na la rten zhes bya'i gzugs la sogs pa ni ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir mig la sogs pa kho na la rten zhes bya'i gzugs la sogs pa ni ma yin zhe na /
translated: why is the basis of visual consciousness said to be the eye and not form?

original: de dag gyur pas 'gyur nyid phyir //
analyzed: de dag gyur pas 'gyur nyid phyir //
translated: Because consciousness changes when the basis changes.

original: rten ni mig la sogs pa yin //
analyzed: rten ni mig la sogs pa yin //
translated: The basis is the eye, etc.

original: khams rnams zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: khams rnams zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: The element is to be supplied in the above two lines.

original: mig la sogs pa rnams gyur pas rnam par shes pa rnams 'gyur ba yin te ;
analyzed: mig la sogs pa rnams gyur pas rnam par shes pa rnams 'gyur ba yin te ;
translated: Consciousness changes when the eye, etc. change,

original: phan pa dang gnod pa dang / gsal ba dang mi gnod pa dang mi gsal ba nyid kyi rjes su byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phan pa dang gnod pa dang / gsal ba dang mi gnod pa dang mi gsal ba nyid kyi rjes su byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it follows the changes in the eye, etc., in terms of benefit and harm, clarity and lack of clarity.

original: gzugs la sogs pa rnams gyur pas ni de dag 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa rnams gyur pas ni de dag 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: The eye, etc. do not change when form, etc. change.

original: de lta bas na de dag la rag lus pa'i phyir de dag nyid rten yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na de dag la rag lus pa'i phyir de dag nyid rten yin no //
translated: Therefore, since they are dependent on the eye, etc., the latter are their support.

original: zhes bya ba ni shin tu legs pa yin gyi gzugs la sogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni shin tu legs pa yin gyi gzugs la sogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: This is the best explanation, not the explanation that the eye, etc. are the support of the eye consciousness, etc.

original: yang de dag gis ni gzugs la sogs pa rnam par shes na /
analyzed: yang de dag gis ni gzugs la sogs pa rnam par shes na /
translated: If the eye consciousness, etc. are the consciousnesses of form, etc.,

original: ci'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: ci'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba nas /
translated: why are they called eye consciousness, etc.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i bar yin gyi gzugs kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba nas chos kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i bar du ni ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i bar yin gyi gzugs kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba nas chos kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i bar du ni ma yin zhe na /
translated: up to mental consciousness, and not called form consciousness, etc. up to dharma consciousness?

original: gang gi phyir de dag gi rten ni mig la sogs pa yin na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de dag gi rten ni mig la sogs pa yin na /
translated: Because the eye, etc. are their support.

original: de'i phyir thun mong ma yin phyir //
analyzed: de'i phyir thun mong ma yin phyir //
translated: Therefore, because they are not common to all,

original: de dag gis ni rnam shes bstan //
analyzed: de dag gis ni rnam shes bstan //
translated: they are called consciousnesses of those.

original: ji ltar na thun mong ma yin pa nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na thun mong ma yin pa nyid yin zhe na /
translated: How are they not common to all?

original: mig ni rnam par shes pa gzhan gyi rten du 'gyur bar mi nus la /
analyzed: mig ni rnam par shes pa gzhan gyi rten du 'gyur bar mi nus la /
translated: The eye cannot be the basis of other consciousnesses.

original: gzugs ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs par yang 'gyur la ;
analyzed: gzugs ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs par yang 'gyur la ;
translated: Form is the object of mental consciousness and

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa gzhan gyi dmigs par yang 'gyur te /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa gzhan gyi dmigs par yang 'gyur te /
translated: it is also the object of another eye consciousness.

original: lus kyi bar du yang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: lus kyi bar du yang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o //
translated: The same should be understood for the body.

original: de lta bas na rten du gyur pa'i phyir dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir de dag kho nas rnam par shes pa bstan gyi gzugs la sogs pas ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta bas na rten du gyur pa'i phyir dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir de dag kho nas rnam par shes pa bstan gyi gzugs la sogs pas ni ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, because they are the basis and because they are not shared in common, consciousness is taught by them alone, not by form and so on.

original: dper na rnga bo che'i sgra @51b dang ; nas kyi myu gu bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na rnga bo che'i sgra @51b dang ; nas kyi myu gu bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like the sound of a drum and the sprout of barley.

original: yang lus dag la gnas te mig gis gzugs rnams la lta ba nas /
analyzed: yang lus dag la gnas te mig gis gzugs rnams la lta ba nas /
translated: Moreover, it is said that the eye sees forms in dependence on the body.

original: ci lus dang mig dang gzugs dang rnam par shes pa de rnams gcig pa kho na zhig yin nam /üîΩ'on te gzhan gyis pa yang yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci lus dang mig dang gzugs dang rnam par shes pa de rnams gcig pa kho na zhig yin nam / 'on te gzhan gyis pa yang yin zhe na /
translated: Are the body, eye, form, and consciousness the same or different?

original: smras pa ; thams cad la bye brag yod de /
analyzed: smras pa ; thams cad la bye brag yod de /
translated: They are different.

original: 'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa rang gi mig gis rang gi gzugs rnams la lta ba ni thams cad rang gis pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa rang gi mig gis rang gi gzugs rnams la lta ba ni thams cad rang gis pa yin no //
translated: When a person born in the realm of desire sees the forms of his realm by means of his eye, all the factors are of his realm.

original: de nyid rang gi gzugs rnams la bsam gtan dang po'i mig gis lta ba na lus dang gzugs dag ni rang gi sa pa yin la /
analyzed: de nyid rang gi gzugs rnams la bsam gtan dang po'i mig gis lta ba na lus dang gzugs dag ni rang gi sa pa yin la /
translated: When he sees the forms of his realm by means of the eye of the first meditation, the body and the forms are of his realm.

original: rnam par shes pa dang mig dag ni de'i sa pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa dang mig dag ni de'i sa pa yin no //
translated: The consciousness and the eye are of the realm of the first meditation.

original: bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa dag la lta na ni gzugs rnams kyang de'i sa pa yin no //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa dag la lta na ni gzugs rnams kyang de'i sa pa yin no //
translated: When he sees the forms of the first meditation, the eye and the forms are of the realm of the first meditation.

original: rang gi gzugs rnams kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa'i mig gis lta ba na lus dang gzugs dag ni rang gis pa yin la /
analyzed: rang gi gzugs rnams kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa'i mig gis lta ba na lus dang gzugs dag ni rang gis pa yin la /
translated: When he sees the forms of his realm by means of the eye of the second meditation, the body and the forms are of his realm.

original: mig ni de'i sa pa yin no //
analyzed: mig ni de'i sa pa yin no //
translated: The eye is of the realm of the second meditation.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i sa ni bsam gtan dang pho'i sa pa yin no //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i sa ni bsam gtan dang pho'i sa pa yin no //
translated: The realm of the visual consciousness is that of the first meditation.

original: bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa dag la lta ba na rnam par shes pa dang gzugs dag ni de'i sa pa yin la /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa dag la lta ba na rnam par shes pa dang gzugs dag ni de'i sa pa yin la /
translated: When he sees the forms of the first meditation, the consciousness and the forms are of the realm of the first meditation.

original: lus ni 'dod pa na spyod pa yin no //
analyzed: lus ni 'dod pa na spyod pa yin no //
translated: The body is of the realm of desire.

original: mig ni bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa pa yin no //
analyzed: mig ni bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa pa yin no //
translated: The eye is of the second meditation stage.

original: bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa pa dag la lta ba na mig dang gzugs dag ni de'i sa pa yin la /
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa pa dag la lta ba na mig dang gzugs dag ni de'i sa pa yin la /
translated: When one sees forms of the second meditation stage with an eye of the second meditation stage, the eye and the form are of that stage.

original: lus ni 'dod pa na spyod pa yin no //
analyzed: lus ni 'dod pa na spyod pa yin no //
translated: The body is of the desire realm.

original: rnam par shas pa ni bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa yin te /
analyzed: rnam par shas pa ni bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa yin te /
translated: The consciousness is of the first meditation stage.

original: de ltar bsam gtan gsum pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa'i mig gis de dag gi sa pa dang / sa 'og ma pa'i gzugs rnams la lta ba yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar bsam gtan gsum pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa'i mig gis de dag gi sa pa dang / sa 'og ma pa'i gzugs rnams la lta ba yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Thus, when one sees forms of the third meditation stage and the fourth meditation stage with an eye of the third meditation stage and the fourth meditation stage, respectively, the three are of their respective stages.

original: bsam gtan dang po'i skyes pa rang gi mig gis rang gi gzugs rnams la lta ba na thams cad rang gi sa pa yin no //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po'i skyes pa rang gi mig gis rang gi gzugs rnams la lta ba na thams cad rang gi sa pa yin no //
translated: When one born in the first meditation stage sees forms of its stage with an eye of its stage, all are of its stage.

original: 'og ma rnams la lta ba ni gsum rang gi sa pa yin no //
analyzed: 'og ma rnams la lta ba ni gsum rang gi sa pa yin no //
translated: When one sees lower forms with an eye of its stage, three are of its stage.

original: rang gi gzugs rnams la bsam gtan gnyis pa'i mig gis lta ba na gsum ni rang gi sa pa yin la /
analyzed: rang gi gzugs rnams la bsam gtan gnyis pa'i mig gis lta ba na gsum ni rang gi sa pa yin la /
translated: When one sees forms of its stage with an eye of the second meditation stage, three are of its stage.

original: mig ni de'i sa pa yin no //
analyzed: mig ni de'i sa pa yin no //
translated: The eye is of that stage.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams la lta ba na lus dang rnam par shes pa dag na rang gi sa pa yin la /
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams la lta ba na lus dang rnam par shes pa dag na rang gi sa pa yin la /
translated: When viewing form of the desire realm, the body and consciousness are of one's own level.

original: gzugs rnams ni 'og ma pa yin no //
analyzed: gzugs rnams ni 'og ma pa yin no //
translated: But form is of a lower level.

original: mig ni de'i sa pa yin no //
analyzed: mig ni de'i sa pa yin no //
translated: The eye is of that level.

original: bsam gtan gnyis pa rnams la lta ba na mig dang gzugs ni de'i sa pa yin la /
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa rnams la lta ba na mig dang gzugs ni de'i sa pa yin la /
translated: When viewing form of the second absorption, the eye and form are of that level.

original: lhag ma ni rang gi sa pa yin te /
analyzed: lhag ma ni rang gi sa pa yin te /
translated: The remaining three are of one's own level.

original: bsam gtan gsum pa la sogs pa'i mig gis lta ba'i yang de bzhin du sbyar ro //üîΩbsam @52a * //
analyzed: bsam gtan gsum pa la sogs pa'i mig gis lta ba'i yang de bzhin du sbyar ro // bsam @52a * //
translated: The same applies to viewing form with the eye of the third absorption and so on.

original: gtan gnyis pa la sogs par skyes pa rang dang gzhan gyi mig dag gis rang dang gzhan gyi sa pa'i gzugs rnams la lta ba la yang ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: gtan gnyis pa la sogs par skyes pa rang dang gzhan gyi mig dag gis rang dang gzhan gyi sa pa'i gzugs rnams la lta ba la yang ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: One born in the second absorption and so on views form of one's own and lower levels with the eye of one's own and other levels.

original: 'di ni nges pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni nges pa yin te /
translated: This is definite:

original: lus la 'og ma'i mig ma yin /
analyzed: lus la 'og ma'i mig ma yin /
translated: The body is not the eye of a lower level.

original: lus dang mig dang gzugs rnams ni 'dod pa na spyod pa nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar sa lnga pa yin no //
analyzed: lus dang mig dang gzugs rnams ni 'dod pa na spyod pa nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar sa lnga pa yin no //
translated: The body, eye and form belong to five levels: the desire realm and the four absorptions.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa dang / sa gnyis pa yin no //üîΩde las gang ba'i lus yin pa sa de ba'am /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa dang / sa gnyis pa yin no // de las gang ba'i lus yin pa sa de ba'am /
translated: The body is of the stage of the consciousness.

original: sa gong ma pa'i mig yin gyi sa 'og ma pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sa gong ma pa'i mig yin gyi sa 'og ma pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The eye is of the stage of the body or of a higher stage, but not of a lower stage.

original: 'di'i mig gi yul ni de'i sa pa 'am /üîΩsa 'og ma pa'i gzugs yin gyi /üîΩmig gi gong ma'i gzugs ma yin /
analyzed: 'di'i mig gi yul ni de'i sa pa 'am / sa 'og ma pa'i gzugs yin gyi / mig gi gong ma'i gzugs ma yin /
translated: The object of the eye is a visible form of its own stage or of a lower stage.üîΩThe eye does not see a visible form of a higher stage.

original: sa gong ma pa'i gzugs sa 'og ma pa'i mig gis mthong bar ni nam yang mi nus so //
analyzed: sa gong ma pa'i gzugs sa 'og ma pa'i mig gis mthong bar ni nam yang mi nus so //
translated: The visible form of a higher stage is not the object of the eye of a lower stage.

original: rnam par shes pa'ang /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'ang /
translated: The consciousness is of the stage of the eye.

original: gong ma ni mig gi ma yin te /
analyzed: gong ma ni mig gi ma yin te /
translated: The consciousness is not of a higher stage than the eye,üîΩlike the visible form.

original: gzugs bzhin no //üîΩde yi gzugs /üîΩlus kyi 'ang gnyi ga thams cad du /
analyzed: gzugs bzhin no // de yi gzugs / lus kyi 'ang gnyi ga thams cad du /
translated: The body is of the stage of the consciousness.üîΩThe body is of the stage of the consciousness, of the eye consciousness.üîΩThe body is of the stage of the consciousness, of the eye consciousness.üîΩThe body is of the stage of the consciousness, of the eye consciousness.üîΩThe body is of the stage of the consciousness, of the eye consciousness.üîΩThe body is of the stage of the consciousness, of the eye consciousness.üîΩThe body is of the stage of the consciousness, of the eye consciousness.üîΩThe body is of the stage of the consciousness, of the eye consciousness.üîΩThe body is of the stage of the consciousness, of the eye consciousness.üîΩThe body is of the stage of the consciousness, of the eye consciousness.üîΩThe body is of the stage of the consciousness, of the eye consciousness.üîΩThe body is of the stage of the consciousness, of the eye consciousness.üîΩThe body is of the stage of the consciousness, of the eye consciousness.üîΩThe body is of the stage of the consciousness, of the eye consciousness.üîΩThe body is of the stage of the consciousness, of the eye consciousness.üîΩThe body is of the stage of the consciousness, of the eye consciousness.üîΩThe body is of the stage of the consciousness, of the eye consciousness.üîΩThe body is of the stage of the consciousness, of the eye consciousness.üîΩThe body is of the stage of the consciousness, of the eye consciousness.üîΩThe body is of the stage of the consciousness, of the eye consciousness.üîΩThe body is of the stage of the consciousness, of the eye consciousness.üîΩThe body is of the stage of the consciousness, of the eye consciousness.

original: de'i zhes bya ba bshad ma thag pa'i mig gi rnam par shes pa'i yul ni gong ma dang 'og ma dang rang gis ba'i gzugs thams cad du yin la /
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba bshad ma thag pa'i mig gi rnam par shes pa'i yul ni gong ma dang 'og ma dang rang gis ba'i gzugs thams cad du yin la /
translated: The body is of the stage of the consciousness, of the eye consciousness.üîΩThe body is of the stage of the consciousness

original: lus kyi 'ang gzugs dang / rnam par shes pa dag thams cad du yin no //
analyzed: lus kyi 'ang gzugs dang / rnam par shes pa dag thams cad du yin no //
translated: The body sense faculty and its consciousness are in all realms.

original: ji ltar mig 'di rgyas par bshad pa ltar /
analyzed: ji ltar mig 'di rgyas par bshad pa ltar /
translated: As the eye is explained in detail,

original: rna ba'ang de bzhin du rig par bya ste /
analyzed: rna ba'ang de bzhin du rig par bya ste /
translated: so the ear should be understood in the same way.

original: lus la 'og ma'i rna ba yin ;
analyzed: lus la 'og ma'i rna ba yin ;
translated: The ear is below the body.

original: / rna ba'i gong ma'i sgra ma yin //
analyzed: / rna ba'i gong ma'i sgra ma yin //
translated: Sound is not above the ear.

original: rnam par shes pa'ang de'i sgra //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'ang de'i sgra //
translated: The consciousness is also called sound.

original: lus kyi'ang gnyi ga thams cad du zhes rgyas par sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: lus kyi'ang gnyi ga thams cad du zhes rgyas par sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The body sense faculty and its consciousness are in all realms.

original: gsum dag ni /
analyzed: gsum dag ni /
translated: The three

original: thams cad rang gi sa pa nyid //
analyzed: thams cad rang gi sa pa nyid //
translated: are of their own level.

original: sna dang lce dang lus kyi khams rnams kyi lus dang rang gi yul dang rnam par shes pa rnams rang gi sa pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: sna dang lce dang lus kyi khams rnams kyi lus dang rang gi yul dang rnam par shes pa rnams rang gi sa pa kho na yin no //
translated: The nose, tongue, and body sense faculties, their objects, and their consciousnesses are of their own level alone.

original: de ltar bye brag tu ma phye bar spyir bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar bye brag tu ma phye bar spyir bstan nas /
translated: Having explained this in general without differentiating,

original: yang bye brag tu dbye ba'i phyir dmigs kyis bsal ba rtsom ste /
analyzed: yang bye brag tu dbye ba'i phyir dmigs kyis bsal ba rtsom ste /
translated: in order to differentiate, the exception is stated.

original: lus kyi rnam shes 'og dang ni //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam shes 'og dang ni //
translated: The body consciousness is below

original: rang gi sa /
analyzed: rang gi sa /
translated: and of its own level.

original: lus dang lus kyi khams dang reg bya ni rtag tu rang gis pa dag kho na yin no //
analyzed: lus dang lus kyi khams dang reg bya ni rtag tu rang gis pa dag kho na yin no //
translated: Body, the body sense faculty, and tactility are always of the level of the body itself.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni kha cig gi ni rang gi sa pa yin te /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni kha cig gi ni rang gi sa pa yin te /
translated: Body consciousness is of the level of the body itself in some instances.

original: 'di lta ste 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang por skyes pa rnams kyi lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'di lta ste 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang por skyes pa rnams kyi lta bu'o //
translated: For example, it is of the level of the desire realm and the first absorption when one is born in the desire realm and the first absorption.

original: kha cig gi ni sa 'og ma yin pas te /
analyzed: kha cig gi ni sa 'og ma yin pas te /
translated: In some instances, it is of a lower level.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: For example,

original: bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs par skyes pa rnams kyi lta bu'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs par skyes pa rnams kyi lta bu'o //
translated: it is of the level of the second absorption when one is born in the second absorption.

original: yid ma nges te /
analyzed: yid ma nges te /
translated: Mental faculty is not definite.

original: res 'ga' ni lus dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang chos dag dang mtshungs pa'i sa pa'i yid @52b yin la ;
analyzed: res 'ga' ni lus dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang chos dag dang mtshungs pa'i sa pa'i yid @52b yin la ;
translated: Sometimes it is the mental faculty of the same level as the body, the mental consciousness, and the phenomena element.

original: res 'ga' ni sa gong ma dang 'og ma pa yin te /
analyzed: res 'ga' ni sa gong ma dang 'og ma pa yin te /
translated: Sometimes it is of a higher or lower level.

original: de nyid kyi phyir sa lnga pa'i lus la yang snyoms par 'jug pa dang / skye ba'i tshe yid la sogs pa ci rigs par sa thams cad pa dag yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir sa lnga pa'i lus la yang snyoms par 'jug pa dang / skye ba'i tshe yid la sogs pa ci rigs par sa thams cad pa dag yin te /
translated: For that reason, when one enters meditative attainment and is born in the five levels, the mental faculty and so on are of all levels.

original: 'di rgyas par ni snyoms par 'jug pa bstan pa'i mdzod kyi gnas nas 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di rgyas par ni snyoms par 'jug pa bstan pa'i mdzod kyi gnas nas 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: This will be explained extensively in the Abhidharmako≈õa in the chapter on meditative attainment.

original: tshig gi khur ha cang mangs pa yongs su spang ba'i phyir da ni mi bshad de /
analyzed: tshig gi khur ha cang mangs pa yongs su spang ba'i phyir da ni mi bshad de /
translated: But I will not explain it here, in order to avoid an excessive burden of words,

original: dgos pa chung la ngal ba che ba'i phyir ro /
analyzed: dgos pa chung la ngal ba che ba'i phyir ro /
translated: because the purpose is small but the effort great.

original: zhar la 'ongs pa'i skabs rdzogs so /
analyzed: zhar la 'ongs pa'i skabs rdzogs so /
translated: The section on the digression is finished.

original: // / da ni 'di dpyad par bya ste /
analyzed: // / da ni 'di dpyad par bya ste /
translated: Now this should be analyzed:üîΩWith respect to the eighteen elements and the six types of consciousness,

original: khams bcva brgyad dang / rnam par shes pa drug po rnams la gang zhig rnam par shes pa gang dag gis rnam par shes par bya ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: khams bcva brgyad dang / rnam par shes pa drug po rnams la gang zhig rnam par shes pa gang dag gis rnam par shes par bya ba yin zhe na /
translated: what is to be known by what consciousness?

original: smras pa ; gnyis kyis rnam par shes phyir lnga //
analyzed: smras pa ; gnyis kyis rnam par shes phyir lnga //
translated: Five are to be known by two.

original: gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya rnams ni grangs bzhin du mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus kyi rnam par shas pa dag gis nyams su myong nas yid kyi rnam par shes pas rnam par shes te /
analyzed: gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya rnams ni grangs bzhin du mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus kyi rnam par shas pa dag gis nyams su myong nas yid kyi rnam par shes pas rnam par shes te /
translated: Form, sound, smell, taste, and tactility are respectively experienced by the eye, ear, nose, tongue, and body consciousnesses and then known by the mental consciousness.

original: de ltar na de dag ni re re zhing rnam par shes pa gnyis kyis rnam par shes par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na de dag ni re re zhing rnam par shes pa gnyis kyis rnam par shes par bya ba yin no //
translated: Thus, each of these is cognized by two consciousnesses.

original: khams lhag ma bcu gsum ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa gcig pus rnam par shes par bya ba yin no zhes rnam par bshad par 'gyur ro //üîΩrtag pa rnams ni du /
analyzed: khams lhag ma bcu gsum ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa gcig pus rnam par shes par bya ba yin no zhes rnam par bshad par 'gyur ro // rtag pa rnams ni du /
translated: The remaining thirteen elements are cognized by the mental consciousness alone, because they are not objects of the five collections of consciousness.üîΩHow many are permanent?

original: mi rtag pa rnams ni du zhe na ;
analyzed: mi rtag pa rnams ni du zhe na ;
translated: How many are impermanent?

original: khams gcig ril por rtag pa ni med mod kyi /
analyzed: khams gcig ril por rtag pa ni med mod kyi /
translated: There is no single element that is entirely permanent.üîΩHowever,

original: 'on kyang / 'dus ma byas chos rtag pa'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang / 'dus ma byas chos rtag pa'o //
translated: the permanent is the unconditioned.

original: des na chos kyi khams kyi phyogs gcig rtag la /
analyzed: des na chos kyi khams kyi phyogs gcig rtag la /
translated: Therefore, one part of the element of mental objects is permanent,

original: lhag ma rnams ni mi rtag pa yin no //üîΩdbang po rnams ni du /
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni mi rtag pa yin no // dbang po rnams ni du /
translated: and the rest are impermanent.üîΩHow many are faculties?

original: dbang po ma yin pa rnams ni du zhe na /üîΩchos kyi phyed dang gang dag ni //
analyzed: dbang po ma yin pa rnams ni du zhe na / chos kyi phyed dang gang dag ni //
translated: How many are not faculties?üîΩHalf of the element of mental objects

original: bcu gnyis nang gi rab shad dbang po //
analyzed: bcu gnyis nang gi rab shad dbang po //
translated: and the twelve internal elements are faculties.

original: mdo las / mig gi dbang po dang / rna ba'i dbang po dang / sna'i dbang po dang / lce'i dbang po dang / lus kyi dbang po dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / mo'i dbang po dang / pho'i dbang po dang / srog gi dbang po dang /
analyzed: mdo las / mig gi dbang po dang / rna ba'i dbang po dang / sna'i dbang po dang / lce'i dbang po dang / lus kyi dbang po dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / mo'i dbang po dang / pho'i dbang po dang / srog gi dbang po dang /
translated: The eye faculty, the ear faculty, the nose faculty, the tongue faculty, the body faculty, the mind faculty, the female faculty, the male faculty, the life faculty,

original: bde ba'i dbang po dang / sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang / yid bde ba'i dbang po dang / yid mi bde ba'i dbang po dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang / dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang /
analyzed: bde ba'i dbang po dang / sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang / yid bde ba'i dbang po dang / yid mi bde ba'i dbang po dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang / dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang /
translated: the pleasure faculty, the pain faculty, the mental pleasure faculty, the mental pain faculty, the neutral faculty, the faith faculty, the effort faculty, the mindfulness faculty,

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang / mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / @53a * //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang / mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / @53a * //
translated: the concentration faculty, the wisdom faculty, the faculty producing complete knowledge of unknown things, the faculty of complete knowledge,üîΩand the faculty possessing complete knowledge.

original: kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang / dbang po nyi shu rtsa gnyis gsungs pa la chos mngon pa ba rnams ni skye mched drug gi go rims rnam par gzhag pa la ma gus pas yid kyi dbang po srog gi dbang po'i mjug thogs su 'don te /
analyzed: kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang / dbang po nyi shu rtsa gnyis gsungs pa la chos mngon pa ba rnams ni skye mched drug gi go rims rnam par gzhag pa la ma gus pas yid kyi dbang po srog gi dbang po'i mjug thogs su 'don te /
translated: The Abhidharmikas, out of disrespect for the order of the six sense bases, list the mental faculty after the life faculty.

original: dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it has a referent object.

original: de la chos kyi phyed ni srog gi dbang po la sogs pa dbang po bcu gcig dang / gsum po dag gi cha ste /
analyzed: de la chos kyi phyed ni srog gi dbang po la sogs pa dbang po bcu gcig dang / gsum po dag gi cha ste /
translated: The half of the phenomena element is the eleven faculties such as the life faculty and part of the three faculties.

original: chos kyi khams kyi phyogs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos kyi khams kyi phyogs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is part of the phenomena element.

original: nang gi bcu gnyis ni mig la sogs pa rang gi ming gis smos pa lnga dang / yid kyi dbang po ni sems kyi khams bdun no //
analyzed: nang gi bcu gnyis ni mig la sogs pa rang gi ming gis smos pa lnga dang / yid kyi dbang po ni sems kyi khams bdun no //
translated: The twelve internal faculties are the five that are mentioned by their own names such as the eyes and the mental faculty, which is the seven mental constituents.

original: pho dang mo'i dbang po dag ni lus kyi khams kyi phyogs yin no zhes 'og nas 'chad do //
analyzed: pho dang mo'i dbang po dag ni lus kyi khams kyi phyogs yin no zhes 'og nas 'chad do //
translated: The male and female faculties are part of the body constituent, as will be explained later.

original: lhag ma khams lnga po de dag dang chos kyi khams kyi phyogs ni dbang po ma yin pa zhes bya ba 'grub bo //
analyzed: lhag ma khams lnga po de dag dang chos kyi khams kyi phyogs ni dbang po ma yin pa zhes bya ba 'grub bo //
translated: The remaining five elements and part of the element of mental objects are not faculties.

original: chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi rnam par bshad pa las khams bstan pa zhes bya ba ste mdzod kyi gnas dang po'o /
analyzed: chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi rnam par bshad pa las khams bstan pa zhes bya ba ste mdzod kyi gnas dang po'o /
translated: This concludes the first chapter on the elements in the treatise Illuminating the Meaning of the Scripture: Treasury of Abhidharma.

original: // / dbang po rnams bshad pa la dbang po'i don ci zhe na /
analyzed: // / dbang po rnams bshad pa la dbang po'i don ci zhe na /
translated: The faculties have been explained. What is the meaning of faculty?

original: dbang ni dbang phyug dam pa'o //
analyzed: dbang ni dbang phyug dam pa'o //
translated: Power is supreme power.

original: de dbang byed pas na dbang po rnams te /
analyzed: de dbang byed pas na dbang po rnams te /
translated: Because they exercise power, they are faculties.

original: de'i phyir dbang byed pa'i don ni dbang po'i don to //
analyzed: de'i phyir dbang byed pa'i don ni dbang po'i don to //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of faculty is the meaning of power.

original: 'di dag las gang zhig gang la dbang byed ce na /
analyzed: 'di dag las gang zhig gang la dbang byed ce na /
translated: What do these faculties exercise power over?

original: lnga po rnams ni don bzhi la dbang byed /
analyzed: lnga po rnams ni don bzhi la dbang byed /
translated: The five exercise power over four things.

original: re zhig mig dang / rna ba dag re re zhing don bzhi la dbang byed pa ni long ba dang 'on pa dag ni mi mdzes pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir lus mdzes par bya ba dang / mthong ba dang / thos nas yang ba yongs su spong ba'i phyir lus yongs su bsrung ba dang /
analyzed: re zhig mig dang / rna ba dag re re zhing don bzhi la dbang byed pa ni long ba dang 'on pa dag ni mi mdzes pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir lus mdzes par bya ba dang / mthong ba dang / thos nas yang ba yongs su spong ba'i phyir lus yongs su bsrung ba dang /
translated: the protection of the body, since one avoids danger after seeing and hearing;üîΩthe generation of eye consciousness and ear consciousness along with their associated elements;

original: mig dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas pa dag skyed pa dang / gzugs blta ba dang sgra mnyan pa dag gi thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyu nyid la dbang byed pa'o //
analyzed: mig dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas pa dag skyed pa dang / gzugs blta ba dang sgra mnyan pa dag gi thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyu nyid la dbang byed pa'o //
translated: and the uncommon cause of seeing form and hearing sound.

original: sna dang lce dang lus rnams ni snga ma bzhin du mdzes par bya ba la dbang byed pa dang / de dag gi kham gyi zas la yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir lus yongs su bsrung ba la dbang byed pa dang / sna la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pas mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas pa rnams skyed pa dang /
analyzed: sna dang lce dang lus rnams ni snga ma bzhin du mdzes par bya ba la dbang byed pa dang / de dag gi kham gyi zas la yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir lus yongs su bsrung ba la dbang byed pa dang / sna la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pas mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas pa rnams skyed pa dang /
translated: They control the generation of the nose, tongue, and body consciousnesses and their concomitant states.

original: dri bsnams pa dang ro myang pa dang / reg bya reg pa rnams kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyu nyid la dbang byed pa'o //
analyzed: dri bsnams pa dang ro myang pa dang / reg bya reg pa rnams kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyu nyid la dbang byed pa'o //
translated: They control the uncommon cause of smelling odors, tasting tastes, and touching tangible objects.

original: bzhi rnams gnyis la lo //
analyzed: bzhi rnams gnyis la lo //
translated: The four faculties control two things.

original: pho dang mo dang srog dang yid kyi dbang po rnams ni re re zhing don gnyis la dbang byed de /
analyzed: pho dang mo dang srog dang yid kyi dbang po rnams ni re re zhing don gnyis la dbang byed de /
translated: The male faculty, female faculty, life faculty, and mental faculty each control two things.

original: re zhig pho dang mo'i dbang po dag ni @53b sems can gyi bye brag dang / khyad par dag la dbang byed de /
analyzed: re zhig pho dang mo'i dbang po dag ni @53b sems can gyi bye brag dang / khyad par dag la dbang byed de /
translated: The male and female faculties control the distinction of sentient beings and the special qualities of sentient beings.

original: de la sems can gyi bre brag ni pho'o mo'o zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de la sems can gyi bre brag ni pho'o mo'o zhes bya'o //
translated: The distinction of sentient beings is called male and female.

original: sems can gyi khyad par ni nu ma la sogs pa dbyibs dang nga ro dang spyod pa gzhan pa nyid do //
analyzed: sems can gyi khyad par ni nu ma la sogs pa dbyibs dang nga ro dang spyod pa gzhan pa nyid do //
translated: The difference between sentient beings is due to the difference in their breasts, shape, voice, and behavior.

original: gzhan dag na re ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba dag la dbang byed de /
analyzed: gzhan dag na re ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba dag la dbang byed de /
translated: Others say that the faculties control defilement and purification.

original: 'di ltar de dag dang mi ldan pa dang / nyams pa za ma dang ma ning dang / mtshan gnyis pa rnams la sdom pa ma yin pa dang / mtshams med pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba kun tu chad pa dang / sdom pa dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar de dag dang mi ldan pa dang / nyams pa za ma dang ma ning dang / mtshan gnyis pa rnams la sdom pa ma yin pa dang / mtshams med pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba kun tu chad pa dang / sdom pa dang /
translated: Thus, those who lack these faculties, or whose faculties are damaged, such as eunuchs, neuter persons, and hermaphrodites, do not have negative commitments, the heinous offenses, severed wholesome roots, vows,

original: 'bras bu 'thob pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams med do zhes zer ro //üîΩsrog gi dbang po ni ris mthun par mtshams sbyor ba dang / yang dag par 'dzin pa dag la dbang byed do //
analyzed: 'bras bu 'thob pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams med do zhes zer ro // srog gi dbang po ni ris mthun par mtshams sbyor ba dang / yang dag par 'dzin pa dag la dbang byed do //
translated: attainment of the fruits, or freedom from attachment.üîΩThe faculty of life force controls the connection to a homogeneous existence and the possession of that existence.

original: yid kyi dbang po ni yang srid par mtshams sbyor ba dang / dbang gi ngo bo dang mthun par byed pa dag la dbang byed de /
analyzed: yid kyi dbang po ni yang srid par mtshams sbyor ba dang / dbang gi ngo bo dang mthun par byed pa dag la dbang byed de /
translated: The mental faculty controls the connection to a new existence and the conformity of the body to the mind.

original: de la yang srid par mtshams sbyor ba la dbang byed pa ni ji skad du /üîΩde'i tshe dri za'i sems gnyis po rjes su chags pa dang / lhan cig par gyur pa 'am /
analyzed: de la yang srid par mtshams sbyor ba la dbang byed pa ni ji skad du / de'i tshe dri za'i sems gnyis po rjes su chags pa dang / lhan cig par gyur pa 'am /
translated: The faculty of linking with the next existence is as follows:

original: khong khro ba dang lhan cig par gyur pa gang yang rung ba zhig mngon du gyur na zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: khong khro ba dang lhan cig par gyur pa gang yang rung ba zhig mngon du gyur na zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
translated: At that time, one of two minds of a gandharva‚Äîthat accompanied by attachment or that accompanied by anger‚Äîbecomes manifest.

original: dbang gi ngo bo dang mthun par byed pa la dbang byed pa ni ji skad du /
analyzed: dbang gi ngo bo dang mthun par byed pa la dbang byed pa ni ji skad du /
translated: The faculty of controlling the concordant aspect of power is as follows:

original: 'jig rten 'di ni sems kyis khrid do zhes rgyas par gsungs pa lta bu'o //üîΩbde ba la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga gang yin pa dang / dad pa la sogs pa gang dag yin pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'di ni sems kyis khrid do zhes rgyas par gsungs pa lta bu'o // bde ba la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga gang yin pa dang / dad pa la sogs pa gang dag yin pa /
translated: The world is led by the mind.üîΩThe five faculties of pleasure and so on and the five such as faith

original: lnga dang brgyad po de rnams ni //üîΩkun nas nyon mongs rnam byang la //
analyzed: lnga dang brgyad po de rnams ni // kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang la //
translated: are the faculties of power.üîΩThey control affliction and purification

original: go rims bzhin du dbang byed de //
analyzed: go rims bzhin du dbang byed de //
translated: in that order.

original: bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re /
analyzed: bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re /
translated: Vaibhasikas say:

original: bde ba la sogs pa lnga po dag ni kun nas nyon mongs pa la dbang byed de /
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa lnga po dag ni kun nas nyon mongs pa la dbang byed de /
translated: The five such as pleasure control affliction.

original: de dag la 'dod chags la sogs pa rgyas par 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag la 'dod chags la sogs pa rgyas par 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because attachment and so on increase in them.

original: dad pa la sogs pa rnams ni rnam par byang ba la dbang byed de /
analyzed: dad pa la sogs pa rnams ni rnam par byang ba la dbang byed de /
translated: Faith and so on are dominant conditions for purification,

original: de dag gis rnam par byang bar byed do //
analyzed: de dag gis rnam par byang bar byed do //
translated: because they purify.

original: gzhan dag na re bde ba la sogs pa rnams ni rnam par byang ba la yang dbang byed de /
analyzed: gzhan dag na re bde ba la sogs pa rnams ni rnam par byang ba la yang dbang byed de /
translated: Others say: Pleasure and so on are dominant conditions for purification,

original: 'di ltar bde bar gyur pa'i sems mnyam par 'jog par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi rgyu can gyi dad pa zhes bya ba dang / yid bde ba la sogs pa nges par 'byung ba la rten pa drug ces 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar bde bar gyur pa'i sems mnyam par 'jog par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi rgyu can gyi dad pa zhes bya ba dang / yid bde ba la sogs pa nges par 'byung ba la rten pa drug ces 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //
translated: because it is said, ‚ÄúThe mind that is happy becomes concentrated,‚Äù ‚Äúfaith that is caused by pleasure,‚Äù and ‚Äúthe six such as mental satisfaction that are based on definite release.‚Äù

original: gzhan dag na re rnam par shes nas yang ba yongs su spong ba'i phyir mig dang rna ba dag gis lus yongs su bsrung ba ni ma @54a * //
analyzed: gzhan dag na re rnam par shes nas yang ba yongs su spong ba'i phyir mig dang rna ba dag gis lus yongs su bsrung ba ni ma @54a * //
translated: Others say: The eyes and ears do not protect the body, because one abandons the body when one perceives danger.

original: yin ba nyid kyi de gnyis rnam par shes pa la ni dbang byed do //
analyzed: yin ba nyid kyi de gnyis rnam par shes pa la ni dbang byed do //
translated: They are dominant conditions for consciousness.

original: gang gi phyir de gnyis thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyu nyid la so sor dbang byed par rung bar 'gyur ba rnam par shes pa las gzhan pa gzugs mthong ba 'am skra thos pa yang med pa de'i phyir de dag de lta bur ni dbang po nyid ma
analyzed: gang gi phyir de gnyis thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyu nyid la so sor dbang byed par rung bar 'gyur ba rnam par shes pa las gzhan pa gzugs mthong ba 'am skra thos pa yang med pa de'i phyir de dag de lta bur ni dbang po nyid ma
translated: Since it is not tenable that they are dominant faculties in the sense of being the uncommon cause of seeing and hearing, respectively, because there is no form seen or sound heard that is different from consciousness, they are not dominant faculties in that way.

original: yin no ; /'o na ji lta bu yin zhe na /
analyzed: yin no ; /'o na ji lta bu yin zhe na /
translated: But how are they dominant faculties?üîΩThe six faculties are dominant

original: rang gi don dang thams cad la //
analyzed: rang gi don dang thams cad la //
translated: in their own objects and in all objects.

original: dmigs par dbang byed phyir dbang drug / mig la sogs pa lnga po dag ni rang rang gi don la dmigs par bya ba la dbang byed do //
analyzed: dmigs par dbang byed phyir dbang drug / mig la sogs pa lnga po dag ni rang rang gi don la dmigs par bya ba la dbang byed do //
translated: The five such as the eye are dominant in observing their own objects.

original: yid ni don thams cad la dmigs par bya ba la dbang byed de /
analyzed: yid ni don thams cad la dmigs par bya ba la dbang byed de /
translated: The mental faculty is dominant in observing all objects.

original: de'i phyir de dag ni so sor dbang po yin no ;
analyzed: de'i phyir de dag ni so sor dbang po yin no ;
translated: Therefore they are dominant faculties individually.

original: /'di la don rnams kyang dbang byed pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: /'di la don rnams kyang dbang byed pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: Aren't objects also dominant?

original: dbang byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dbang byed pa ma yin te /
translated: They are not dominant.

original: lhag par dbang byed pa nyid ni dbang byed pa nyid yin la /
analyzed: lhag par dbang byed pa nyid ni dbang byed pa nyid yin la /
translated: To be dominant is to be superior.

original: mig ni gzugs thams cad la dmigs par bya ba la thun mong gi rgyu yin pa'i phyir dang / dmigs pa de gsal ba dang mi gsal ba nyid la sogs pa'i rjes su byed pa'i phyir gzugs la dmigs par bya ba la lhag par dbang byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: mig ni gzugs thams cad la dmigs par bya ba la thun mong gi rgyu yin pa'i phyir dang / dmigs pa de gsal ba dang mi gsal ba nyid la sogs pa'i rjes su byed pa'i phyir gzugs la dmigs par bya ba la lhag par dbang byed pa yin gyi /
translated: The eye is dominant in observing visible form because it is the common cause of observing all visible form, and it is dominant in observing clear and unclear visible form and so on.

original: de las bzlog pa yin pa'i phyir gzugs kyi ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de las bzlog pa yin pa'i phyir gzugs kyi ni ma yin te /
translated: But form is not dominant in observing the eye because it is the opposite of that.

original: yid chos rnams la dbang byed pa'i bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar ro //üîΩmo nyid pho nyid las dbang phyir //
analyzed: yid chos rnams la dbang byed pa'i bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar ro // mo nyid pho nyid las dbang phyir //
translated: The same applies to the mental faculty being dominant in observing phenomena.üîΩFemale and male faculties are established from the body faculty.

original: lus las mo dang po'i dbang dag / lus kyi dbang po kho na las mo dang pho'i dbang po dag rnam par bzhag ste /
analyzed: lus las mo dang po'i dbang dag / lus kyi dbang po kho na las mo dang pho'i dbang po dag rnam par bzhag ste /
translated: Female and male faculties are established from the body faculty alone.

original: don tha dad par gyur pa dag ni med kyi lus kyi dbang po'i cha 'ga' ste /
analyzed: don tha dad par gyur pa dag ni med kyi lus kyi dbang po'i cha 'ga' ste /
translated: They are not separate substances, but rather certain parts of the body faculty.

original: mdoms kyi phyogs mo dang pho'i dbang po'i ming 'thob pa gang yin pa de ni rim bzhin du mo nyid dang pho nyid dag la dbang byed pa'i phyir ro /
analyzed: mdoms kyi phyogs mo dang pho'i dbang po'i ming 'thob pa gang yin pa de ni rim bzhin du mo nyid dang pho nyid dag la dbang byed pa'i phyir ro /
translated: The organ of touch is called the organ of the male and the organ of the female. They are called the organ of the male and the organ of the female because they exercise controlling power with regard to masculinity and femininity.

original: de la mo'i ngo bo ni rang bzhin nga ro dang g-yo ba dang bsam ba dag ste /üîΩde ni mo'i mo nyid yin no //
analyzed: de la mo'i ngo bo ni rang bzhin nga ro dang g-yo ba dang bsam ba dag ste / de ni mo'i mo nyid yin no //
translated: Femininity is the nature, voice, behavior, and thoughts of a woman.

original: pho'i ngo bo ni rang bzhin nga ro dang g-yo ba dang bsam pa dag pa dag ste /üîΩde ni pho'i pho nyid yin no //
analyzed: pho'i ngo bo ni rang bzhin nga ro dang g-yo ba dang bsam pa dag pa dag ste / de ni pho'i pho nyid yin no //
translated: Masculinity is the nature, voice, behavior, and thoughts of a man.üîΩThe faculty of vitality exercises controlling power with regard to the duration of a class affiliate.

original: rigs gnas kun nas nyon mongs dang // rnam par byang la dbang byed phyir //üîΩsrog dang tshor ba rnams dang ni //
analyzed: rigs gnas kun nas nyon mongs dang // rnam par byang la dbang byed phyir // srog dang tshor ba rnams dang ni //
translated: The five faculties of sensation exercise controlling power with regard to defilement.

original: dad sogs dbang po lngar 'dod do //
analyzed: dad sogs dbang po lngar 'dod do //
translated: The five faculties of faith, etc., exercise controlling power with regard to purification.

original: srog gi dbang po ni ris mthun par gnas par bya ba la dbang byed do //üîΩtshor ba rnams ni kun nas nyon mongs par bya ba la dbang byed de /
analyzed: srog gi dbang po ni ris mthun par gnas par bya ba la dbang byed do // tshor ba rnams ni kun nas nyon mongs par bya ba la dbang byed de /
translated: The faculty of vitality exercises controlling power with regard to the duration of a class affiliate.

original: 'di ltar mdo las /
analyzed: 'di ltar mdo las /
translated: The five faculties of sensation exercise controlling power with regard to defilement, because the S≈´tra says:

original: bde ba'i tshor ba la ni 'dod chags rgyas par 'gyur /
analyzed: bde ba'i tshor ba la ni 'dod chags rgyas par 'gyur /
translated: Pleasant sensation increases craving.

original: sdug bsngal la ni khong khro ba //
analyzed: sdug bsngal la ni khong khro ba //
translated: Anger is with regard to suffering.

original: sdug bsngal @54b yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa la ni ma rig pa zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: sdug bsngal @54b yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa la ni ma rig pa zhes gsungs so //
translated: Ignorance is with regard to that which is neither pleasant nor unpleasant.

original: dad pa la sogs pa lnga po dag ni rnam par byang bar bya ba la dbang byed de /
analyzed: dad pa la sogs pa lnga po dag ni rnam par byang bar bya ba la dbang byed de /
translated: The five beginning with faith are the faculties of purification.

original: 'di ltar de dag gis nyon mongs pa rnams kyang rnam par gnon la lam yang 'dren par byed do //
analyzed: 'di ltar de dag gis nyon mongs pa rnams kyang rnam par gnon la lam yang 'dren par byed do //
translated: In fact, they suppress the defilements and lead to the path.

original: de nyid kyi phyir de dag kyang so sor dbang po yin par 'dod do ;üîΩ/ mya ngan 'das sogs gong nas gong //üîΩ'thob pa la ni dbang byed phyir //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de dag kyang so sor dbang po yin par 'dod do ; / mya ngan 'das sogs gong nas gong // 'thob pa la ni dbang byed phyir //
translated: That is why they are considered to be faculties individually.

original: kun shes byed dang kun shes dang // de bzhin kun shes ldan dbang po //
analyzed: kun shes byed dang kun shes dang // de bzhin kun shes ldan dbang po //
translated: The faculty of final knowledge and the faculty of the possession of final knowledge are the faculties of the attainment of nirvana and so on.

original: de bzhin zhes bya ba'i sgra ni so sor dbang po yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde la kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po ni kun shes pa'i dbang po 'thob par bya ba la dbang byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin zhes bya ba'i sgra ni so sor dbang po yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro // de la kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po ni kun shes pa'i dbang po 'thob par bya ba la dbang byed do //
translated: The word ‚Äúand‚Äù indicates that the faculty of final knowledge and the faculty of the possession of final knowledge are faculties individually.

original: kun shes pa'i dbang po ni /
analyzed: kun shes pa'i dbang po ni /
translated: The faculty of final knowledge is the faculty that is dominant with regard to the attainment of the faculty of final knowledge.üîΩThe faculty of final knowledge is the faculty that is dominant with regard to the attainment of the faculty of final knowledge.

original: kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po thob par bya ba la dbang byed do //
analyzed: kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po thob par bya ba la dbang byed do //
translated: It is the faculty of final and perfect knowledge that controls the attainment of the faculty of having understood completely.

original: kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba la dbang byed de /
analyzed: kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba la dbang byed de /
translated: It is the faculty of having understood completely that controls the attainment of final and complete NirvƒÅ·πáa.

original: sems rnams par ma grol ba la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems rnams par ma grol ba la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For there is no final and complete NirvƒÅ·πáa for those whose minds are not completely liberated.

original: sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rnam grangs gzhan bstan par bya ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rnam grangs gzhan bstan par bya ba'i phyir te /
translated: The word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù is used to indicate other synonyms.

original: rnam grangs gzhan gang zhe na /
analyzed: rnam grangs gzhan gang zhe na /
translated: What are the other synonyms?

original: kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa spong ba la dbang byed do //
analyzed: kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa spong ba la dbang byed do //
translated: The faculty of understanding completely controls the abandonment of the defilements that are to be abandoned by the path of vision.

original: kun shes pa'i dbang po ni bsgoms pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa spong ba la dbang byed do //
analyzed: kun shes pa'i dbang po ni bsgoms pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa spong ba la dbang byed do //
translated: The faculty of having understood completely controls the abandonment of the defilements that are to be abandoned by the path of cultivation.

original: kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ni mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i phyir dbang byed de /
analyzed: kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ni mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i phyir dbang byed de /
translated: The faculty of having understood completely controls the attainment of the bliss of the present life for one who has understood completely.

original: rnam par grol bas dga' ba dang bde ba la so sor yang dag par myong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par grol bas dga' ba dang bde ba la so sor yang dag par myong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they experience joy and pleasure through liberation.

original: dbang byed pa'i phyir dbang po nyid yin na /
analyzed: dbang byed pa'i phyir dbang po nyid yin na /
translated: If faculties are faculties because they exercise controlling power,

original: ma rig pa la sogs pas kha bskang dgos te /
analyzed: ma rig pa la sogs pas kha bskang dgos te /
translated: then ignorance and so on should be added to the list of faculties.

original: ma rig pa la sogs pa dag kyang 'du byed la sogs pa rnams la dbang byed pas /
analyzed: ma rig pa la sogs pa dag kyang 'du byed la sogs pa rnams la dbang byed pas /
translated: Because ignorance and so on exercise controlling power over formation and so on.

original: de'i phyir de dag kyang dbang po nyid du kha bskang bar bya la /
analyzed: de'i phyir de dag kyang dbang po nyid du kha bskang bar bya la /
translated: Therefore they should be added to the list of faculties.

original: ngag la sogs pa dag dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / rkub dang / mdoms rnams kyang tshig dang / len pa dang / 'gro ba dang / rtug pa dang / kun tu dga' ba'i bya ba dag la dbang byed pa'i phyir dbang po nyid du kha bskang bar bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: ngag la sogs pa dag dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / rkub dang / mdoms rnams kyang tshig dang / len pa dang / 'gro ba dang / rtug pa dang / kun tu dga' ba'i bya ba dag la dbang byed pa'i phyir dbang po nyid du kha bskang bar bya'o zhe na /
translated: Also speech and so on, the hands, feet, anus and genitals should be added to the list of faculties because they exercise controlling power over speech and so on, taking up, moving, excreting and sexual pleasure.

original: kha bskang bar mi bya ste 'di ltar 'dir ni /
analyzed: kha bskang bar mi bya ste 'di ltar 'dir ni /
translated: They should not be added because here the Abhidharmakosa states:üîΩThe basis of mind, its specific states,

original: sems kyi rten dang de'i bye brag / gnas dang kun nas nyon mongs nyid //
analyzed: sems kyi rten dang de'i bye brag / gnas dang kun nas nyon mongs nyid //
